data.text: @gnocchiwizard FFS, it’s always “dark money” did this thing we have no argument against because it’s correct but need to make the people in question (truckers, parents) seem bad because… why? Why do they need to make everyone a dark money villain?
@gnocchiwizard Walker, LOOK AT THE REST OF THE WORLD. I can't even...
@gnocchiwizard With idiot friends like these, who needs enemies.

@IncreaseMather4 yeah i mean that's been happening on a loop since the imperial college's estimates proved to be off by a few orders of magnitude. it's very weird and it doesn't seem to be stopping, people just forget what they thought last week.
@gnocchiwizard The claims that are proven false by watching as nothing happens over the next 30 days are painful bc they just get memory-holed.
